scene_description_enriched: A young man with blue hair, wearing a green tunic and purple leggings, rides a white horse. He is seated on a red saddle with decorative white and red straps. The horse is adorned with a red bridle and harness. The background is a deep red with gold scrolling patterns. To the right, a stylized green tree with a golden trunk is visible. The ground is depicted as green grass with flecks of gold. The scene is enclosed within a circular frame with decorative borders.
